config.viabedrockutility.title: ViaBedrockUtility Settings
config.viabedrockutility.option.preset.t: Controls how entity animations are simplified at distance
config.viabedrockutility.option.tier1_di: Distance threshold for tier 1 LOD. Entities closer than this use full animation rate.
config.viabedrockutility.option.tier1_in: Animation update interval for tier 1. Higher values reduce update frequency.
config.viabedrockutility.option.tier2_di: Distance threshold for tier 2 LOD. Entities between tier 1 and this distance use tier 2 rate.
config.viabedrockutility.option.tier2_in: Animation update interval for tier 2. Higher values reduce update frequency.
config.viabedrockutility.option.tier3_di: Distance threshold for tier 3 LOD. Entities between tier 2 and this distance use tier 3 rate.
config.viabedrockutility.option.tier3_in: Animation update interval for tier 3. Higher values reduce update frequency.
